topics.title: How I Built APL: Turning Claude Code into an Autonomous Dev Team
topics.notes: Part of AI Dev Tools cluster. Primary keyword: autonomous coding agent. Links to GitHub repo.

topics.title: Building a Claude Code Plugin Marketplace for CMS Analysis
topics.notes: Part of AI Dev Tools cluster. Primary keyword: claude code plugin. Targets enterprise CMS developers.

topics.title: How APL Built This Entire Blog While I Watched
topics.notes: Capstone of AI Dev Tools cluster. Links back to APL post. Showcase real autonomous results.

topics.title: My 2026 Dev Setup: From Vanilla Claude Code to Autonomous Workflows
topics.notes: Developer setup post inspired by Boris Cherny's vanilla setup. Angle: heavy Claude Code customization with APL. Links to APL post.

topics.title: The Supervisor in the Machine: Why I Built STUDIO
topics.notes: Evolution story from APL to STUDIO. Covers ORC and ALLOY generations. Key theme: supervision beats scale. Part of AI Dev Tools cluster.

topics.title: AI Isn't Just for Coders: How Claude Skills Bridge the Gap
topics.notes: Part 1 of Claude Skills series. Targets non-technical business users. Primary keyword: claude skills. Addresses AI adoption resistance with Skills as the solution. Series: Part 2 = power users, Part 3 = developers.

topics.title: Claude Skills for Power Users: Scripts, Teams, and Architecture
topics.notes: Part 2 of Claude Skills series. Targets power users and AI-curious professionals. Covers 3-tier architecture, executable scripts, validation patterns, team deployment, real workflow examples.

topics.title: Claude Code Skills and the Agent Skills Open Standard
topics.notes: Part 3 of Claude Skills series. Targets developers. SKILL.md deep dive, invocation control, subagents, hooks, Agent Skills open standard, 10+ platform adoption, portability matrix.

topics.title: MCP Apps: Interactive UI Has Entered the Chat
topics.notes: Covers MCP Apps extension launch (Jan 26, 2026). Architecture deep dive, SDK overview, getting started guide. Primary keyword: MCP Apps. Links to STUDIO and dev setup posts.

ideas_backlog.title: Advanced Caching Strategies in Next.js
ideas_backlog.notes: Cover ISR, cache tags, on-demand revalidation, edge caching

ideas_backlog.title: Building Accessible Components from Scratch
ideas_backlog.notes: Focus on keyboard navigation, ARIA, screen readers
ideas_backlog.source: WCAG compliance work on this blog
